generate: Easily generate custom commands for scheduling shutdowns, restarts, sleep, hibernation, log-offs, and more for both {windows} and {macos} in just seconds.
noCoding: No coding requiredâ€”simply choose your desired action, set the timer, and our tool will generate the command for you. You can either copy the command to your clipboard or download it as a .bat (Windows) or .command (MacOS) file for easy execution. Perfect for automating power management with simplicity and precision on both platforms.
canOnly: Can only abort restart and shutdown. Other actions can be canceled by closing the command window
forces: Forces the system to restart, shut down, log out, or hibernate, even if there are running applications with unsaved data or if an application is blocking the action
